metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3784 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability classified as critical was found in Axiomatic Bento45e7bb34. Affected by this vulnerability is the functionAP4_Mp4AudioDsiParser::ReadBits of the file Ap4Mp4AudioInfo.cpp of thecomponent mp4hls. The manipulation leads to heap-based buffer overflow. Theattack can be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to thepublic and may be used. The associated identifier of this vulnerability isVDB-212563.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
